    • AudioLoader

  • Method Details

    • resetAudioLoader

      public void resetAudioLoader​(java.lang.String path)

    • getSound

      public org.mini2Dx.core.audio.Sound getSound​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns the Sound object by name. Getting the Sound object itself is useful for having more control over the Sound object in the game code.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the Sound file to get
      Returns:
      the Sound object

    • playSound

      public void playSound​(java.lang.String fileName)

    • playSound

      public void playSound​(java.lang.String fileName, java.math.BigDecimal volume, java.math.BigDecimal pitch, java.math.BigDecimal pan)
      Plays a sound with the given parameters applied.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the sound file to play, including the extension (wav, ogg, mp3)
      volume - the volume to play this sound at, range 0 to 1
      pitch - the pitch shift value, between 0.5 and 2.0
      pan - the left/right pan value, between -1.0 and 1.0

    • stopSound

      public void stopSound()
      Stops all Sounds from playing.

    • stopSound

      public void stopSound​(java.lang.String fileName)

    • getMusic

      public org.mini2Dx.core.audio.Music getMusic​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Returns the Music object by name. Useful for having more manual control of the Music object in game code.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the Music file.
      Returns:
      the Music object

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic​(java.lang.String fileName)

    • playMusic

      public void playMusic​(java.lang.String fileName, boolean loop)

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic()

    • stopMusic

      public void stopMusic​(java.lang.String fileName)

    • pauseAudio

      public void pauseAudio()
      Pauses all audio from playing.

    • resumeAudio

      public void resumeAudio()
      Resumes the last playing song. Note: Sometimes Sound objects are not resumed. Not sure why.

    • disposeAudioLoader

      public void disposeAudioLoader()
      Stops all audio from playing and disposes the assets.
